title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.10 - Sale of merchandise prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.10 - Sale of merchandise prohibited

State Regulations

The sale or offering for sale of any merchandise within
one-half hour prior to, during, or within one-half hour after the conclusion of
any games of chance license period is prohibited, except for the sale of or
offering for sale of games of chance supplies or bell jar tickets by the
licensee or the sale of food or refreshments, if authorized, by the
licensee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4622.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
